    • nextAppointment

      public static void nextAppointment()
      sends alert at login if there is an appointment within 15 minutes. If no appointment, congratulates users for being prepared and loggin in early.

    • comingAppt

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> comingAppt()
      Utilized by nextAppointment in order to tell if there is appt within 15 min
      Returns:
      null observable list

      Returns:

    • checkTimeAvailability

      public static boolean checkTimeAvailability(int customerID, LocalDate newDate, LocalTime newStart, LocalTime newEnd, int apptID) throws SQLException
      checks if there is already an appointment at the time requested by this new appointment
      Parameters:
      customerID - the customer id
      newDate - the proposed date of this appt
      newStart - the proposed start time of this appt
      newEnd - the proposed end time of this appt
      apptID - the appt id
      Returns:
      if there is availability at the time requested
      Throws:
      SQLException - .
